Title: Watanabe
UnlockDesc: One of your companions. You can't recall how you met him right now.
CompleteDesc: "War," the Horseman you signed a Blood Covenant with, capable of summoning Demon's Flintlock. To end the Iron Army's atrocities, he joined your crusade against the Sanctuary.

Title: Demon's Flintlock
UnlockDesc: Watanabe's levitating firearm, whose mechanism and operating principle remain a mystery.
CompleteDesc: Watanabe's levitating firearm, whose mechanism and operating principle remain a mystery.

Title: "Gyrfalcon"
UnlockDesc: Watanabe's father and the Iron Army's former commander.
CompleteDesc: Watanabe's father and the Iron Army's former commander.

Title: Watanabe's Plan
UnlockDesc: It seems Watanabe is planning something that requires your support.
CompleteDesc: It seems Watanabe is planning something that requires your support.

Title: The Iron Army
UnlockDesc: They were once humanity's bastion against demons but now a lackey of them, helping the Angels to rule the Scorched Borderland's inhabitants.
CompleteDesc: They were once humanity's bastion against demons but now manipulated by the Sanctuary and has become its bloodthirsty lackey, slaughtering people on this land under the remote control of the Angels.

Title: Morigan
UnlockDesc: Nirvatia's magical pet, who's following you around at this very moment.
CompleteDesc: Nirvatia's magical pet, who's following you around at this very moment.

Title: The Quiet Rolling Stone Valley
UnlockDesc: A transportation hub connecting the east and the west of the Scorched Borderland. It seems that the Angels have never attacked this place. Black market merchants from near and far all choose it to ship valuable goods to the west.
CompleteDesc: A transportation hub connecting the east and the west of the Scorched Borderland. It seems that the Angels have never attacked this place. Black market merchants from near and far all choose it to ship valuable goods to the west.

Title: Manipulated by the Sanctuary
UnlockDesc: Those manipulated by the Sanctuary will become obedient puppets, with death being their sole escape.
CompleteDesc: Those manipulated by the Sanctuary will become obedient puppets, with death being their sole escape.

Title: Corrupted by the Act of God
UnlockDesc: Many plants and animals have mutated as a result of the blood rain Act of God.
CompleteDesc: Many plants and animals have mutated as a result of the blood rain Act of God.

Title: The Scherman Bastion Under Attack
UnlockDesc: A sacked city. Watanabe has found fresh camping traces in the suburbs.
CompleteDesc: A sacked city. Watanabe has found fresh camping traces in the suburbs.

Title: Traveling Merchant
UnlockDesc: A merchant you saved who's willing to offer you horses and supplies for free.
CompleteDesc: A merchant you saved who's willing to offer you horses and supplies for free.

Title: Halo Fortress
UnlockDesc: An important stronghold controlled by the Iron Army. Rumor has it that it is exactly where the godslayer Halo Cannon is.
CompleteDesc: An important stronghold controlled by the Iron Army. The army is bringing in all its forces across the Scorched Borderland here at full speed. To make it quick, the team has made an "inside-outside attack plan," preparing to launch a surprise attack on the fortress.

Title: Death of Iron
UnlockDesc: One of the famous Three Ashfire Heroes who actually controls the Iron Army. Now this formidable battler is manipulated by the Sanctuary and has lost his reason.
CompleteDesc: One of the famous Three Ashfire Heroes who actually controls the Iron Army. Now this formidable battler is manipulated by the Sanctuary and has lost his reason.

Title: Halo Bullets
UnlockDesc: The Iron Army's relic. Load the Halo Cannon with these bullets and you'll get a godslayer beam gun. However, this requires extended charging before use, so average bullets are recommended in normal case.
CompleteDesc: The Iron Army's relic. Load the Halo Cannon with these bullets and you'll get a godslayer beam gun. However, this requires extended charging before use, so average bullets are recommended in normal case.

Title: The Arrest Warrant
UnlockDesc: An arrest warrant with Watanabe's portrait and "Most Wanted, 100000 Mammon."
CompleteDesc: An arrest warrant with Watanabe's portrait and "Most Wanted, 100000 Mammon."

Title: The Rallied Rebel Forces
UnlockDesc: The armed forces that have gathered under the banner of the "Gray Raven." They are equipped with outdated weapons but high in morale.
CompleteDesc: The armed forces that have gathered under the banner of the "Gray Raven." They are equipped with outdated weapons but high in morale.

Title: The Influx of Refugees
UnlockDesc: The refugees flooding in from all directions have put the Rusty Yoke's support systems under tremendous pressure.
CompleteDesc: The refugees flooding in from all directions have put the Rusty Yoke's support systems under tremendous pressure.

Title: The Halo Fortress' Recent Situation
UnlockDesc: Recently, the Iron Army has been retreating to the Halo Fortress. The Fortress itself has reinforced its defenses and is heavily guarded now.
CompleteDesc: Recently, the Iron Army has been retreating to the Halo Fortress. The Fortress itself has reinforced its defenses and is heavily guarded now.

Title: Death Knight
UnlockDesc: One of your companions. You can't recall how you met him right now.
CompleteDesc: "Death," the Demon Lord you signed a Blood Covenant with, is capable of immortality. To reclaim the Hell Train, she joined your crusade against the Sanctuary.

Title: Entrenching Shovel
UnlockDesc: One of the famous Three Ashfire Heroes who actually controls the Iron Army. Now this formidable battler is manipulated by the Sanctuary and has lost his reason.
CompleteDesc: One of the famous Three Ashfire Heroes who actually controls the Iron Army. Now this formidable battler is manipulated by the Sanctuary and has lost his reason.

Title: Demon Lord
UnlockDesc: It is said that only a rare few high-ranking demons have received the Death Lord's blessing, gaining immense power and the title of Demon Lord. They rule Hell in his stead and are never able to kill one another.
CompleteDesc: It is said that only a rare few high-ranking demons have received the Death Lord's blessing, gaining immense power and the title of Demon Lord. They rule Hell in his stead and are never able to kill one another.

Title: The Hell Train
UnlockDesc: The Death Knight's train was once seized by the Sanctuary, but later reclaimed by you and the Four Knights.
CompleteDesc: The Death Knight's train was once seized by the Sanctuary, but later reclaimed by you and the Four Knights.

Title: Rift of Chaos
UnlockDesc: The passage between the mortal world and Hell. Demons once flooded through this rift, waging a long and brutal war against mankind.
CompleteDesc: The passage between the mortal world and Hell. Demons once flooded through this rift, waging a long and brutal war against mankind.

Title: Death Lord
UnlockDesc: Nyarlathotep, also known as "The Death Lord", is an abyssal overlord who rules Hell and governs the laws of life and death.
CompleteDesc: Nyarlathotep, also known as "The Death Lord", is an abyssal overlord who rules Hell and governs the laws of life and death.

Title: Hell
UnlockDesc: The prison to which the Supreme Heaven casts all fallen souls. It is a realm of demons, known along with the Sanctuary and the Mortal Realm as the "Three Realms."
CompleteDesc: The prison to which the Supreme Heaven casts all fallen souls. It is a realm of demons, known along with the Sanctuary and the Mortal Realm as the "Three Realms." After the collapse of the laws of life and death, the Demon Lords once loyal to the Death Lord turned on each other, plunging Hell into endless war and bloodshed. It is said that the fallen dead who still adhere to order are cast into "Purgatory," a rift at Hell's edge, to await rebirth.

Title: Souls Entering Hell
UnlockDesc: The people at the Scorched Borderland believe that upon death, souls are judged by their deeds: the virtuous ascend to Heaven, while the wicked are cast into Hell.
CompleteDesc: The people at the Scorched Borderland believe that upon death, souls are judged by their deeds: the virtuous ascend to Heaven, while the wicked are cast into Hell.

Title: The Collapse of Laws of Life and Death
UnlockDesc: After the Supreme Heaven sealed the Death Lord within the Hall of A Thousand Demons, the cycle of life and death fell into disarray. Souls could no longer ascend to heaven or descend to Hell after death. Instead, they become wandering, living dead trapped in the mortal world.
CompleteDesc: After the Supreme Heaven sealed the Death Lord within the Hall of A Thousand Demons, the cycle of life and death fell into disarray. Souls could no longer ascend to heaven or descend to Hell after death. Instead, they become wandering, living dead trapped in the mortal world.

Title: Demon Lord
UnlockDesc: It is said that only a rare few high-ranking demons have received the Death Lord's blessing, gaining immense power and the title of Demon Lord. They rule Hell in his stead and are never able to kill one another.
CompleteDesc: It is said that only a rare few high-ranking demons have received the Death Lord's blessing, gaining immense power and the title of Demon Lord. They rule Hell in his stead and are never able to kill one another.

Title: The Tribunal
UnlockDesc: A religious order formed by human zealots fanatically devoted to the Supreme Heaven, once dominant in the pre-cataclysmic age. They created an artifact, known as the "Crown of Judgment," which is capable of revealing whether one has committed a sin.
CompleteDesc: A religious order formed by human zealots fanatically devoted to the Supreme Heaven, once dominant in the pre-cataclysmic age. They created an artifact, known as the "Crown of Judgment," which is capable of revealing whether one has committed a sin.

Title: Purgatory Furnace
UnlockDesc: A treasure of Mammon, the Golden King. It is said that the Mammon Coins commonly used in the Scorched Borderland are minted in this very furnace.
CompleteDesc: A treasure of Mammon, the Golden King. It is said that the Mammon Coins commonly used in the Scorched Borderland are minted in this very furnace.

Title: Devil
UnlockDesc: Not every soul can be clearly judged as good or evil. Those who linger between are sent to Purgatory—the border between Hell and the mortal world—becoming the "lawful evil," known as Devils.
CompleteDesc: Not every soul can be clearly judged as good or evil. Those who linger between are sent to Purgatory—the border between Hell and the mortal world—becoming the "lawful evil," known as Devils.

Title: Witch Haida
UnlockDesc: A witch who allied with the Sanctuary to ambush the Death Knight. She is also a Demon Lord.
CompleteDesc: A witch who allied with the Sanctuary to ambush the Death Knight. As a Demon Lord and an old acquaintance of the Death Knight, she seeks to stall for time within the Demon Fortress until the Omega Egg hatches for some unknown purpose.

Title: The Ever-Shifting Demon Fortress
UnlockDesc: The Demon Fortress seems to have gained a will of its own. Its interior structures constantly change, forming a twisted, confounding labyrinth.
CompleteDesc: The Demon Fortress seems to have gained a will of its own. Its interior structures constantly change, forming a twisted, confounding labyrinth.

Title: Swelling Omega Egg
UnlockDesc: The Omega Egg implanted in the chest of the Chaos Gate Emissary is pulsing and growing over time.
CompleteDesc: The Omega Egg implanted in the chest of the Chaos Gate Emissary is pulsing and growing over time.

Title: Legend of the Scroll of the Valley of Ash
UnlockDesc: "When the egg hatches, it shall cleanse Hell of all corruption. The dead of past and future shall rise anew."
CompleteDesc: "When the egg hatches, it shall cleanse Hell of all corruption. The dead of past and future shall rise anew."

Title: Arcane Gates
UnlockDesc: These portals are created by the Chaos Gate Emissary and can connect to any location. The "Rift of Chaos"—that once linked the mortal world and Hell, sparking war between humans and demons—is also one of them.
CompleteDesc: These portals are created by the Chaos Gate Emissary and can connect to any location. The "Rift of Chaos"—that once linked the mortal world and Hell, sparking war between humans and demons—is also one of them.

Title: The Ferryman's Pen
UnlockDesc: A heavily worn fountain pen. Its cap is engraved with an elegant name: Lustrous.
CompleteDesc: A heavily worn fountain pen. Its cap is engraved with an elegant name: Lustrous.

Title: The Witch's Chessboard
UnlockDesc: A handmade chessboard with the creator's signature carved into the frame's corner: Hell's Greatest Demon!
CompleteDesc: A handmade chessboard with the creator's signature carved into the frame's corner: Hell's Greatest Demon!

Title: Wanshi
UnlockDesc: A silver-haired youth who travels with you. Somehow you can't recall how you met.
CompleteDesc: Bound to you, the Pestilence Knight consumes the souls of the dead. Together you seek a way to find the truth and end the calamity.

Title: Beak Mask
UnlockDesc: Wanshi always carries this plague mask. Its beak is stuffed with herbs.
CompleteDesc: Wanshi always carries this plague mask. Its beak is stuffed with herbs.

Title: Eerie Ritual Altar
UnlockDesc: A hidden altar beneath the castle, built by tribal cultists.
CompleteDesc: A hidden altar beneath the castle, built by tribal cultists. It has been destroyed by Wanshi and Gray Raven.

Title: Tribal Runes
UnlockDesc: Strange runes left at the live sacrifice site, pronounced "Carcosa."
CompleteDesc: Strange runes left at the live sacrifice site, pronounced "Carcosa."

Title: Scattered Spent Shells
UnlockDesc: These spent shells at the altar came from Wanshi's sidearm. There was clearly a fight here.
CompleteDesc: These spent shells at the altar came from Wanshi's sidearm. There was clearly a fight here.

Title: Locust Corpse
UnlockDesc: Dried blood-locust remains are scattered all over ground zero of the calamity.
CompleteDesc: Dried blood-locust remains are scattered all over ground zero of the calamity.

Title: Tribespeople
UnlockDesc: Natives of the Scorched Borderland who once fought settlers a thousand years ago, now hiding in the forest.
CompleteDesc: The tribespeople have not forgotten the blood debt of a millennium past. To this day, they still seek revenge against the borderlanders by conducting living sacrifice rituals across the Scorched Borderland.

Title: Wanshi's Investigation Notes
UnlockDesc: Wanshi's investigation notes, describing how the serial murder victims died of blood loss.
CompleteDesc: Wanshi's investigation notes, describing how the serial murder victims died of blood loss. The mummified bodies found in the forest died the same way, their throats cut and drained.

Title: Goat Carving
UnlockDesc: A crude wooden carving of a goat, found at a ritual altar and crafted by tribal followers.
CompleteDesc: A crude wooden carving of a goat, found at a ritual altar and crafted by tribal followers.

Title: Eerie Symbol
UnlockDesc: A tribal religious emblem recorded in the Great Library, twisted lines forming a pentagram.
CompleteDesc: A tribal religious emblem recorded in the Great Library, twisted lines forming a pentagram. The killer arranged the murders to form this very symbol across the map.

Title: Pocket Candy
UnlockDesc: Candy Wanshi gave the children, in flavors such as cream, chocolate, and cinnamon apple.
CompleteDesc: Candy Wanshi gave the children, in flavors such as cream, chocolate, and cinnamon apple.

Title: Fresh Herbs
UnlockDesc: Fresh herbs gathered from the forest, effective only after proper preparation.
CompleteDesc: Fresh herbs gathered from the forest, effective only after proper preparation.

Title: Canary
UnlockDesc: The only survivor Wanshi saved in the old castle, claiming to be from the Haruka tribe.
CompleteDesc: Her true identity is the Holy Maiden of the tribe, sworn to carry out their vengeance.

Title: Tribal Insignia
UnlockDesc: Special emblems painted on the tribespeople, matching the pentagrams on the goat carvings.
CompleteDesc: Special emblems painted on the tribespeople, matching the pentagrams on the goat carvings.

Title: Dagger Beneath the Tree
UnlockDesc: A bone-blade dagger found beneath a dried corpse, handmade by the tribespeople.
CompleteDesc: A bone-blade dagger found beneath a dried corpse, handmade by the tribespeople.

Title: Herbal Aroma
UnlockDesc: A lingering herbal scent in the forest, also detected in the old castle.
CompleteDesc: A lingering herbal scent in the forest, also detected in the old castle.

Title: Tribal Past
UnlockDesc: The tribespeople were massacred by settlers a thousand years ago, and the hatred endures to this day.
CompleteDesc: The tribespeople were massacred by settlers a thousand years ago, and the hatred endures to this day.

Title: Legend of the Giant
UnlockDesc: The tribespeople worship Holy Death, believing that live sacrifice can summon a pale giant to destroy their enemies.
CompleteDesc: The tribespeople worship Holy Death, believing that live sacrifice can summon a pale giant to destroy their enemies.

Title: Lilith
UnlockDesc: A mysterious woman who travels as your companion. You cannot recall how you first met her.
CompleteDesc: The Famine Knight, bound to you by Blood Covenant, wields the power to ignite anything her umbrella tip touches. She joins you in striking the Sanctuary, bent on vengeance against Madam Raphael.

Title: Sanctuary Game
UnlockDesc: The Sanctuary's card table is bound by alchemical matrices to ensure fairness. Few mortals dare to challenge angels by taking a seat at it.
CompleteDesc: The Sanctuary's card table is bound by alchemical matrices to ensure fairness. Few mortals dare to challenge angels by taking a seat at it.

Title: Lilith's Confession
UnlockDesc: Lilith claims she was silenced after exposing an archangel's cheating at the tables, but there are hints her story conceals more than she lets on.
CompleteDesc: Lilith claims she was silenced after exposing an archangel's cheating at the tables, but there are hints her story conceals more than she lets on.

Title: Mammon's Treasure
UnlockDesc: Legend says that Mammon's hoard lies sealed within a purgatory stronghold called the City of No Return, its vault door opened only by Mammon's Key.
CompleteDesc: Legend says that Mammon's hoard lies sealed within a purgatory stronghold called the City of No Return, its vault door opened only by Mammon's Key.

Title: Counterfeit Wager
UnlockDesc: To dodge losses, some gamblers slip in fakes in place of real stakes. Once exposed, the table erupted into a brawl—only this counterfeit token remains by the cards.
CompleteDesc: To dodge losses, some gamblers slip in fakes in place of real stakes. Once exposed, the table erupted into a brawl—only this counterfeit token remains by the cards.

Title: Legend of the Inferno
UnlockDesc: Rumor has it the devils' seat of power lies within the inferno, teeming with souls forever chasing after gold.
CompleteDesc: Rumor has it the devils' seat of power lies within the inferno, teeming with souls forever chasing after gold.

Title: Madam Raphael
UnlockDesc: One of the four archangels, host of the Sanctuary Game in the mortal realm—and the very target of Lilith's revenge.
CompleteDesc: One of the four archangels, commanded by the Supreme Heaven to hunt for clues to Mammon's treasure and the City of No Return. After becoming enemies with Lilith, she turned her fury on us in a string of assaults, driven by some goal she has yet to reveal.

Title: Plundered Town
UnlockDesc: Lately, Madam Raphael's angels have been raiding towns with increasing frequency. Where once they came only to slaughter, now they scour the very earth itself, digging for coins fallen from the trains.
CompleteDesc: Lately, Madam Raphael's angels have been raiding towns with increasing frequency. Where once they came only to slaughter, now they scour the very earth itself, digging for coins fallen from the trains.

Title: Unowned Mammon Vault
UnlockDesc: Since the last Mammon vanished, the throne of the City of No Return has stood empty. Whoever claims the title will inherit the immeasurable wealth sealed within its vault.
CompleteDesc: Since the last Mammon vanished, the throne of the City of No Return has stood empty. Whoever claims the title will inherit the immeasurable wealth sealed within its vault.

Title: Intermittent Ambush
UnlockDesc: Between their plundering of towns, the angels have begun targeting me and Lilith as well—clearly after more than just gold.
CompleteDesc: Between their plundering of towns, the angels have begun targeting me and Lilith as well—clearly after more than just gold.

Title: Resident Militia
UnlockDesc: To defend themselves, the people of Whitehorse formed a militia, convinced it would shield their wealth from the angels sent to "reclaim" fallen coins.
CompleteDesc: To defend themselves, the people of Whitehorse formed a militia, convinced it would shield their wealth from the angels sent to "reclaim" fallen coins.

Title: Gambler in the Bar
UnlockDesc: After the angels stripped the town of its lives and wealth, the gamblers only multiplied. Some, short on funds, have joined the hunt for coins spilled from passing trains, hoping to make a fortune.
CompleteDesc: After the angels stripped the town of its lives and wealth, the gamblers only multiplied. Some, short on funds, have joined the hunt for coins spilled from passing trains, hoping to make a fortune.

Title: Infinite Illusion Realm
UnlockDesc: A mirage within Mammon's treasure vault, capable of ensnaring all who enter.
CompleteDesc: The Infinite Illusion Realm grants fulfillment of every desire—even the former Mammon could not resist its lure. Only by relinquishing all the wealth gained inside can one escape through the exit at the golden mountain's peak.

Title: The Trapped Ones' Consciousness
UnlockDesc: All soul-bearing beings within the illusion are humans or demons caught here. Though every desire can be fulfilled, over time they gradually lose their sense of self.
CompleteDesc: All soul-bearing beings within the illusion are humans or demons caught here. Though every desire can be fulfilled, over time they gradually lose their sense of self.

Title: Peculiar Paper Crane
UnlockDesc: A beautiful white paper crane. According to a ghost within the illusion, following its path forward will eventually lead you to the answer.
CompleteDesc: A beautiful white paper crane. According to a ghost within the illusion, following its path forward will eventually lead you to the answer.

Title: Former Mammon
UnlockDesc: The former Golden King, content with the illusion's gifts. Though he knows the way out, he chooses to remain here nonetheless.
CompleteDesc: The former Golden King, content with the illusion's gifts. Though he knows the way out, he chooses to remain here nonetheless.

Title: Mortal Creation
UnlockDesc: Those within the illusion can freely conjure almost anything to satisfy their desires, except for living beings.
CompleteDesc: Those within the illusion can freely conjure almost anything to satisfy their desires, except for living beings.

Title: Conditions for Entering the Illusion
UnlockDesc: Anyone who leaves the illusion by their own will can never return, by any means. Not even the current Mammon can force them back inside.
CompleteDesc: Anyone who leaves the illusion by their own will can never return, by any means. Not even the current Mammon can force them back inside.

Title: Spiral Graveyard
UnlockDesc: A cluster of structures built by nameless ghosts within the illusion. Their creator became lost in the rapture of fulfilled desires long ago.
CompleteDesc: A cluster of structures built by nameless ghosts within the illusion. Their creator became lost in the rapture of fulfilled desires long ago.
